He says those opportunities could come from snack food companies, quick-service restaurants and major soft drinks companies, including those that market energy drinks. The energy drink category could be out there for him because of the explosion in that marketplace, says Headley. Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who served a federal prison term after a dogfighting conviction, recently signed an endorsement deal with a Philadelphia-area company that equipped him with protective gear. Elected officials including newly elected U.S. Barack Obama Mark Kirk will serve as hosts at the dinner, which will continue the fundraising push the Illinois Republican Party started earlier this month. Illinois Republican Party Chairman Pat Brady, We had a fantastic year in 2010 with Mark Kirk winning a seat in the United States Senate, winning five tough Congressional battles and sending two GOP Statewide office holders to Springfield. We are thrilled to have Presidential Contenders coming here to Chicago, and I am confident one of them will replace Barack Obama in 2012. As of today, confirmed Presidential contenders attending the event include: Speaker Newt Gingrich , Rick Santorum , Ambassador Rick Santorum Bolton and Congressman Mike Pence Other invited Presidential Contenders yet to confirm their attendance:

Mr. Watson said word of Mr. Andy Coulson 's resignation had been`` sneaked out'' on a busy news day when former Tony Blair was testifying before an inquiry into the Iraq war. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth, Mr. Watson said. For the Labour Party, Mr. Andy Coulson 's departure partly overshadowed its own woes over the departure of Mr. Johnson, a veteran Labour official and former government minister.
